resources.string: Cloud service storage is full. Go to upgrade or manage storage
Cloud service plan expired. Go to renew
Auto-sync the following data to Flyme cloud and all devices with the same Flyme ID to ensure that important data is never lost
Personal data and system backup files
A total of %s backup records, taking up space of %s
Related app found to be uninstalled. Going back to homepage.
"Cloud album is disabled but cloud data hasn't been cleared. Please try again later"
"Your phone is disabled but cloud data hasn't been cleared. Please try again later"
Will close the auto-backup and clear the cloud data. Please be cautious! Local data will not be affected
Mailbox sync complete. Tap to log in
Can automatically backup desktop layout, apps, personalization, and part of settings to the cloud
%s item(s) in the cloud will be synced to your phone.
%s contact(s) in the cloud will be synced to your phone.
%s added, %s deleted, and %s modified in cloud. Data will be synced to phone.
%s added, %s deleted, and %s modified in cloud. Data will be synced to phone.
Tap to view and recover contacts
1 contact will be removed by %s. Continue?
%s contacts will be removed by %s. Continue?
1 note will be removed by %s. Continue?
%s notes will be removed by %s. Continue?
Time machine is restoring data, unable to sync manually
Phone information not found on server
Unable to load data from server.
Server is busy. Retry again later.
Unable to send data to server.
A total of %s photos, taking up space of %s
Auto backup images to the cloud to save local storage
%d albums and %d photos have been backed up
Error getting cloud service storage. Tap to retry
Failed to get storage information. Tap to retry
Cloud service storage is almost full. Go to upgrade or manage storage
Cloud service plan is about to expire. Tap to renew
No WLAN network available right now. Retry failed items over mobile network?
Sync via cellular network will consume your data
Visit cloud.flyme.cn to manage your cloud data
Sync failed due to an error in updating local data
Account %s encountered an error updating local data.
Sync failed due to an error in reading local data
Account %s encountered an error reading local data.
Sync failed due to an error in writing local data
Account %s encountered an error writing local data.
"Can't sync when backup or restore is in progress"
"To protect your contacts, messages and other data from potential loss, it's recommended to sync them to the cloud."
Log into cloud service to view and manage data
Using slider control. Currently set to %1$s
Sync failed because another device is syncing
Network unavailable. Please check your network settings.
No network connection. Please check your network settings.
It will consume %s of cellular data
New version found. Tap to update
Update file is downloaded and tap to install
If you skip this version, you will not be prompted to install it
All sync switches are turned off. Please turn on the desired sync switches and retry.
No WLAN network. Please connect to a network and retry.
No network connection. Please check your network settings.
No network connection. Please check your network settings.
Enabling auto-sync will allow you to travel to more points in time.
Backup the apps, desktop layout and personal data in the mobile phone to the cloud to ensure that the data is never lost
Frequent sync. Try it again later
Account %s is removing too much data. Please confirm.
Only cloud sync can continue to be used
Cloud storage is full. Cloud album and cloud backup will not be able to sync new data, but data sync still can be used
The contact will be deleted after recovery.
Contacts in cloud have been recovered to the state on %s.
Contacts recovered to the state on %s
Data will be recovered to the state on %s
Removed data can be stored in the web recycle bin.
Go to recycle bin to restore data ?
Sync error: sync unavailable for demo devices
No history found for the contact
Sync failed due to a resource permission error
Account %s encountered a user permission error.
Search for and recover a contact
Disable service and clear cloud data
Cloud Sync can be in use even the storage is full
Cloud Sync still can be used normally
The current storage is valid until %s
Sync failed due to an error in processing local data
Account %s encountered an error processing local data.
Sync failed due to unstable network connection
Sync failed due to a data removing error. Please retry
Sync failed. Server is busy, please try later
Account %s encountered a cloud server error.
Please connect to the network and retry
Sync failed. Server is busy, please try later
Account %s encountered a format error of cloud data.
Sync failed. Error in program, please try later
Account %s encountered a cloud processing error.
Sync service is unavailable now, please try later
"Local contacts hasn't been synced to the server yet. Do you want to sync them first?"
Data will be synced before you view details
Local data is in sync with cloud data
Sync failed due to a login error. Please try again
Sync failed due to an error in security verification
Account %s encountered an error checking account security.
Insufficient space, unable to backup automatically
Space insufficient. Only Cloud Sync available
"Can't sync when backup or restore is in progress"
Sync personal data to Flyme cloud and other devices with the same Flyme ID to ensure that important data is never lost

got null auth token for scope: %s
